text: The biological antiviral activity of E. coli-derived recombinant porcine IFN-lambda 3 was prepared in our laboratory and evaluated in MDBK cells using a recombinant vesicular stomatitis virus (VSV) with a GFP reporter as described previously (22, 24) . The weight-activity unit (U/ml) of samples was calculated using porcine prokaryotic-derived IFN-α (4.0 × 10 8 U/mg) (Prosit Sole Biotechnology, Co., Ltd., Beijing, China) as a reference.
